text:
Created attachment 26178
Code to make the Lenya TinyMCE plugins work with Tiny 3.x

The appended zip archive contains the files

 simplebrowser/editor_plugin.js
 unloadhandler/editor_plugin.js
 unloadhandler/langs/de.js
 unloadhandler/langs/en.js

(pathnames are relative to the tinyemce plugin directory)

I tested them with TinyMCE 3.0.8.  They should still work together wirk Tiny 2.x, but I did not test that.

 Rainer
creator: rainer.schoepf@gmx.net

text: Patches applied to trunk, to be released with 2.0.4
creator: rainer.schoepf@gmx.net
